title: Protect your customers from the RIAA
summary: This ISP has the right idea: treat the RIAA hacking threat like any other hacking threat. Let's see how long before this is made illegal. In the meantime, I'm trying to come up with a way to convince myself that it's worth buying an XServe and colocating with them. But first, I've got to come up with a business model to make some money to afford the toys. :) This will likely never happen.
